title: #EnergySavingService.v1_0_0.EnergySavingService

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ServiceEnabled.description: This property indicates whether the intelligent energy saving function is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value is of Boolean type, which indicates whether the intelligent energy saving function is enabled.

DeactiveThreshold.description: This property indicates the threshold for canceling the intelligent energy saving configuration.
DeactiveThreshold.longDescription: If the threshold is exceeded, the intelligent energy saving configuration will be canceled.

ExpectedDeactiveConfiguration.description: This property indicates the parameters used to cancel the intelligent energy saving configuration.
ExpectedDeactiveConfiguration.longDescription: This property is used to cancel the intelligent energy saving configuration when the threshold is exceeded.

ExpectedActiveConfiguration.description: This property indicates the Intelligent energy saving configuration that is expected to take effect.
ExpectedActiveConfiguration.longDescription: This property indicates the Intelligent energy saving configuration that is expected to take effect.

ActualActiveConfiguration.description: This property indicates the intelligent energy saving configuration that has taken effect.
ActualActiveConfiguration.longDescription: This property indicates the intelligent energy saving configuration that has taken effect.

EnergySavingService.description: This is the energy saving service information.
EnergySavingService.longDescription: energy saving service information, including the enablement status and domain controller information.

enumDescriptions.Sharing: The redundancy mode of the power redundancy group is load balancing.
enumDescriptions.Failover: The redundancy mode of the power redundancy group is active/standby.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LogicalCoreCpuUtilisePercents.description: This property indicates the threshold of the maximum CPU usage of the logical cores.
LogicalCoreCpuUtilisePercents.longDescription: When this threshold is exceeded, the intelligent energy saving configuration will be canceled.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DEMTEnabled.description: This property indicates whether DEMT is enabled.
DEMTEnabled.longDescription: The value is of Boolean type, which indicates whether DEMT is enabled.

PowerControl.description: This property indicates the power supply working status.
PowerControl.longDescription: This property indicates the working status of the power supply.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerMode.description: This property indicates the power supply working status.
PowerMode.longDescription: This property indicates the working status of the power supply.

ActivePSU.description: This property indicates the list of activated PSUs.
